segments.text: Hello , I'm Jack . Are you Christina ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes I am . Nice to meet you , Jack .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I am German . I live in Munich .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really , I went to Munich last week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . It is a fantastic city . And I like German food as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And where are you from , Jack ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am from California in the United States . But I am now studying in England .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am studying languages . This year I am doing German and Italian .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , excellent . Why don't we talk in German for a while then ?
segments.speaker: S2
